long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say "No!" to Comic Sans, and "Hello" to an internet free of the typeface. With "Say No To Comic Sans", you will never have to fear web designers and their pernicious choice of Comic Sans for their web font. From now on, you'll have the chance to view each web page in its more attractive, Comic Sans-free form, and experience the web for what it should be: an internet free of Comic Sans!
